summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5780 for the improvement of 30th Avenue West, from West Armour Street to West Barrett Street; and east side only, from West Barrett Street to West Dravus Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76212 as amended by Ordinance No. 76835, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
